00074         cout <<"Will create " << numEvents << " events" << endl;

00076         for(Int_t i = 0; i < numEvents; i++){
00077                 bIsBoloEvent = bIsMuonEvent = false;
00078                 mEv->Clear("C"); //clear the event at the beginning, just to be sure.

00080                 if((i % 2000) == 0) 
00081                         cout << i << " events filled" << endl;

00083                 //mEv->SetDataCleaningWord(4);

00090                 mEv->GetMuonVetoSystemRecord()->SetIsSystemOn(true);

00093                 mEv->GetMuonVetoSystemRecord()->SetRunEndTime(1270512000);  //April 6, 2010 at 00:00
00094                 
00095                 
00096                 //5% chance of a Muon event... which is probably way too huge.
00097                 if(gRandom->Rndm() < 0.5){
00098                         Int_t nMod = 1 + (Int_t)(3*gRandom->Rndm());
00099                                                 
00100                         for(Int_t i = 0; i < nMod; i++) {
00101                                 bIsMuonEvent = true;
00102                                 KHLAMuonModuleRecord* mMuonModule = mEv->AddMuonModule();
00103                                 mMuonModule->SetModuleNumber(40*gRandom->Rndm());
00104                                 mMuonModule->SetAdc(0,(Int_t)(290*gRandom->Rndm()));
00105                                 mMuonModule->SetAdc(1,(Int_t)(4056*gRandom->Rndm()));
00106                                 mMuonModule->SetTdc(0,200.0*gRandom->Rndm());
00107                                 mMuonModule->SetTdc(1,mMuonModule->GetTdc(0) + 200.0*gRandom->Rndm());
00108                                 mMuonModule->SetEnergy(0,(Int_t)(2048*gRandom->Rndm()/1.0e6)); //divide by 1 MeV...?

00114                                                 
00115                         Int_t nBolo = 1 + (gRandom->Poisson(0.95));
00116                         for (Int_t i = 0; i < nBolo; i++) {
00117                                 bIsBoloEvent = true;
00118                                 KHLABolometerRecord* mBolo2 = mEv->AddBolo();
00119                                 
00120                                 mBolo2->SetQvalue(gRandom->Rndm());
00121                                 mBolo2->SetEnergyRecoil(100.0*gRandom->Rndm());
00122                                 mBolo2->SetEnergyIon(100.0*gRandom->Rndm());
00123                                 mBolo2->SetEnergyHeat(100.0*gRandom->Rndm());
00124                                 if(i==0) {

00126                                         mBolo2->SetDetectorNumber(5);
00127                                 }
00128                                 else {
00129                                         mBolo2->SetDetectorName("ID2",3);

00131                                 }
